typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	metric_name_split as string (metric_name)
}
source(output(
		ok as boolean,
		metrics as (name as string, ok as boolean, data as (group as (uuid as string, name as string, type as string), index as integer, next_level as (value as integer, validity as string, group as (start as string, finish as string, type as string), index as integer)[])[])[],
		metric_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('dynamicRange', 2,
		metric_date,
		metrics.name
	)) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1 foldDown(unroll(metrics.data.next_level, metrics.data),
	mapColumn(
		group = metrics.data.group,
		index = metrics.data.index,
		next_level = metrics.data.next_level,
		metric_name = metrics,
		metric_date,
		location_id = metrics
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(location_id = group.uuid,
		metric_name = metric_name.name,
		metric_start = next_level.group.start,
		metric_finish = next_level.group.finish,
		metric_value = toInteger(next_level.value),
		metric_validity = next_level.validity) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		metric_name,
		metric_date,
		location_id,
		metric_start,
		metric_finish,
		metric_value,
		metric_validity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		location_id,
		metric_date,
		metric_name,
		metric_start,
		metric_finish,
		metric_value,
		metric_validity
	),
	format: 'table') ~> combinetraffic
